powerset

public static LinkedHashSet<Set<String>> powerset(String[] set)
Returns the power set from the given set by using a binary counter Example: S = {a,b,c} P(S) = {[], [c], [b], [b, c], [a], [a, c], [a, b], [a, b, c]}
